title: Power cut schedule for today in Sri Lanka: November 5th
dc:creator: Editor
description:
The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has approved power cuts for a duration of 01 hour

The post Power cut schedule for today in Sri Lanka: November 5th appeared first on NewsIn.Asia.
content:encoded:
Colombo, Nov 5 (newsin.asia) – The power cut schedule for today in Sri Lanka.

The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) announced power cuts on Saturday (5th November).

PUCSL Chairman Janaka Ratnayake said that 1-hour power cuts have been approved for Saturday, the 5th of November.
